title: Nike Cortez Leather
description: You spoke. We listened. Based on your feedback, we've revamped the original Cortez while maintaining the retro appeal you know and love. Now with a wider toe area and firmer side panels, you can comfortably wear them day in and day out. Plus, the leather upper has been re-engineered to help prevent warping or creasing. Cortez fansâ€”this one's for you.
